sp_documentation.content:
#Welcome to Pulse! ##What is Pulse? Pulse is an application to help you manage ServiceNow development in a complex multi-instance environment using the tools already available within ServiceNow. It adheres to the principles of CI/CD, and allows developers, product managers, and management to track development efforts throughout the development lifecycle. ##Overview of a Development Request Pulse uses development requests to track all development work throughout the full lifecycle and to automate the promotion of update sets.
![Screenshot](DevRequestMainView.png)
![Screenshot](DevRequestProcessTab.png)
sp_documentation.title: 0001|Welcome To Pulse
